overview_of_class: CSD 421 is a seminar devoted to advanced clinical issues. Guest lecturers will address various clinical topics and/or pathologies of the auditory system. Differential diagnosis and advanced clinical management will be emphasized throughout the class. We will also read and discuss scientific literature relevant to professional practice.
name: Pathologies II
title: SoC CSD 421-0-1 Pathologies II
